If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

Use these captions as a reference, but do not rely on them completely. Your goal is to fully capture the spatial framing and movements in this video. The book has white pages with dense, small black text, and the cover of another book beneath it is partially visible, showing a solid color. The person wears a plain, light-colored shirt, and the background is out of focus, suggesting a calm, quiet setting. No overlays, text, or digital elements are present in the video.**

Please note that the video features **multiple different subjects in focus**, so the description should clearly distinguish their types and relationships.
